Title: Relates to requiring that certain information be printed on appearance tickets for alleged traffic infractions
Summary: Relates to requiring that certain information be printed on appearance tickets for alleged traffic infractions.
LawCode: Amd ยง150.10, CP L; amd ยง510, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the inclusion of certain information on an appearance ticket; and to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to suspensions for failure to pay driver responsibility assessments
